short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to calculate different matrices of wonderland

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is on-the-go calculator for your staked time on wonderland. 
It allows you to track your daily income as well as shows you how what your balance would be on a specified date. The calculations are based on the current data.
Extensions fetches the latest price from coingecko api and uses the data from the wonderland official website to calculate different matrices.

IT DOES NOT:
> Read or access your wallet
> Store your data anywhere
> Record any personal information like IP/Wallet Address

IT DOES:
> Read/Scrap your current MEMO balance from website for the calculation.

This is an opensource project. You can find the code here:
https://github.com/ShivamPandya/wonderlandcalc
